website_summaries.verdict: With its deep storytelling, compelling cast, and exciting battles, you won’t want to stop playing once your customized “Commander Shepard” character has finally saved the galaxy.
pros: Includes Mass Effect and its 2 sequels
Character and story choices are imported between games
cons: Does not include all downloadable content

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It Already
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there are plenty four or five star reviews here so I'll be keeping this short. This trilogy is great. The overarching story is fantastic but it's the cast of varied and well-written characters that makes the game truly shine. I didn't have the opportunity to play through the series until a few years ago but the franchise instantly became a favorite. There's a reason there is a huge amount of nostalgia surrounding the series. This is also one of the few times I would suggest buying all of the DLC. The content will add new characters and missions as well as some various equipment. Just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: Just the best ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a wonderful storyline. Long play makes it difficult to achieve maximum ending possibility. Don't like having to play on-line to increase endgame possibilities though - 4 stars for that. After reflection and listening to other players it seems to have a cerebral ending with a bit of controversy from the community of players but still an epic series in my book. Pssst ... the follow on series is better than you might think when you play it even though it seems a bit linear.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great on a console but no so good on a PC.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I really like the RPG character development, and exploration of areas. What I didn't like was that to use a game controller on a PC, I had to use a 3rd party mod, which made actually using the controller very difficult at targeting. A few times my character would get stuck and the only option was to restart the game. Battles we're very tedious after dying several times in order to advance.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Brent

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Is an exellent game trilogy! It is a super fun scify game that really let me immerse myself into the game. It has great characters and has plenty of missions and side quests. It lets you choose how the game turns out and really has consequences to the choices you make in the game. The game does not have all the DLC but it does come with the Cerberus Network, Bring Down the Sky, and Pinnacle Station. If you want all the DLC you wont get it from this trilogy set. But if you don't really care about the DLC it's worth the price, especially if you are new to the mass effect unniverse.
customer_reviews.author: Kiro

customer_reviews.title: Compatability issues, game never worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for windows 7, tried to install and encountered various issues with installation. After perhaps 5 hours of troubleshooting online could not figure out nature of problem and never was able to install (there are many complaints online regarding EA game compatibility and customer service). Will not be buying any EA games for PC after this experience
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, fun game
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite game series. Took awhile to download but that's only because I have very slow Wi-fi. It'll take up a good chunk of memory on your computer though so if your storage is limited I would keep that in mind. It's true that it doesn't come with all the DLC but it's not the end of the world for me. The game is still plenty of enjoyable without all the DLC. And yes Origin is a pain but you'll just have to suffer through it if you want to play.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: It does not have all the DLC!
customer_reviews.text: My optical drive or hdd is pretty slow in installing through copying the discs, so i end up downloading from origin. it came in new as expected, the slip cover is good quality and tight, in case collectors would like to know if the metal case just slips out, It doesnt. It doesnt come with ALL the dlc which was disappointing; you would have to download and buy citadel dlc and others you would be interested in to have the ultimate mass effect experience. I love these games so complaints about that.
customer_reviews.author: The Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Third game won't load.
customer_reviews.text: It only let me load the first two games on my computer. It wanted to make me download the third game rather than load it from disk. I bought the game to load not download. Can't download multiple gigabytes no access. They should have said that up front and saved me my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Best deal around
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how inexpensive this is! Although the first two games are outdated in terms of graphics and gameplay, they still hold up incredibly well. This is thanks to the immersive world that is built. If you are in need of a great Sci-fi story, you'll get it here along with some fun gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: An excellent game for sc--fi lovers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game for my wife. My daughter still plays ME and it's a good game with good graphics, good game play, fairly easy controls, and a great story line. One star off because of the need to download the totally unwanted Origin client. Software companies keep coming up with bloatware we don't want. At any rate, the Mass Effect trilogy are great games! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best RPG Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I think that the Mass Effect Trilogy is the best RPG ever. Buy it. You become Commander Shepard fighting against the greatest threat the galaxy has ever seen, the Reapers. No Spoilers, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: AudeKhatru

customer_reviews.title: The series is amazing but I had a hard time with the installation ...
customer_reviews.text: The series is amazing but I had a hard time with the installation as my 2nd games disc didn't work and the third game required internet anyway to download, which sucks for people that live out in the middle of no where with bad for internet.
customer_reviews.author: D3athScyth3002

customer_reviews.title: Painless Download Process
customer_reviews.text: Mass effect is one of those games that you can always come back to and play and for the price that I got it for was a steal. My only note is that I did not know the game was through origin and not steam as most of my library is on the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great series
customer_reviews.text: The top of this page clearly states DRM:Origin. There is nothing hidden there. Nothing wrong with Amazon's description. Origin is required for all EA games on PC these days. Origin isn't as well designed as Steam, but is not harmful in any way. Great series here. Bioware has top notch story telling. This is one of the best franchises this past generation of games. I can't wait for another title in this series. The only downside to this trilogy pack is they didn't include the DLC. Shame on you Bioware. I got this on sale here for $9.99 previously
customer_reviews.author: Jack_Bauer

customer_reviews.title: and these games are all amazing. Everyone should play them
customer_reviews.text: This game trilogy was a bargain when I got it on sale for $10, and these games are all amazing. Everyone should play them. However, it was a pain in the butt to have to download the client and go through the whole process of getting the games installed... they really made it more complicated than it should have been. If you already have the client installed and have bought games digitally through amazon before, then you may not mind, but I wish I had just bought the games on disc.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Great game....
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to install the game because I do not have an internet connection. I do not feel it is good for anyones business to force customers to pay for internet service just to play a game on their computer! I have the manual that states two installation types: 1) for disc installation, 2) for origin installation. Both of these options require an internet connection and download of the game. However, from experience this is not a full download, the game still requires a connection to the internet and the user to be signed in to play the game.
customer_reviews.author: AW/1362

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! ME 3. Will not install from the disks. And EAs response is to download the 10 GB game. Because as the tech told me "no one buys disks anymore"
customer_reviews.author: M. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: I feel really bad giving this 4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This is easily my favorite video game series of all time. Easily. Great atmosphere, great voice acting, the whole shebang. I'm taking a point off for the DLC. For the included DLC that I couldn't get working. For the DLC I didn't purchase that adds significant characters and missions to the game. For the DLC that costs far, far more than the base games themselves. Absolutely buy it. I can't recommend it enough. Just know about the DLC.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Kaluza

customer_reviews.title: and is ridiculously fun.
customer_reviews.text: I spent 7 hours installing the first two games and all of the extra content, just to find out that the third game won't install at all, and that even though the first one downloaded properly, it won't open and allow me to play it. The only reason that I'm giving this two stars is because the second game worked, and is ridiculously fun.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: good except for origin
customer_reviews.text: The stars are not for the game but for the need to have an origin account to register/download the games. They games are just as I remember. If it was redeemable through steam I would give 5 stars. I just hate EA/origin. They care little for their customers and I feel like I openrx a Pandora box installing their softwAre.
customer_reviews.author: Gundamman

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh I love the mass effect series have played all of them numerous times. The only thing I wish is that all the dlc was included in this package. The download was very easy you do have to set-up an origins account to play. Not sure if an internet connection is needed to play as I never turn mine off. But you actually log-in through Origins so I would think yes. Anyway hope you like me as much as I have over the years. Its an rpg shooter with lots of lore. Don't want to give anything away but if you are into great stories this is the game for you!!
customer_reviews.author: dingosky95

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly. I'd heard good things about this game, but it is hands down one of the greats. It doesn't have the twitchy, hyperreaction speed requirements of other shooters like Call of Duty or even the more recent Titanfall. Instead you get a solid, solid story line with deep characters and open worlds. The action is good with a heavy emphasis on cover. Control is relatively fluid given the breadth of team commands, powers, and weapons you can use. Can't recommend enough, a definite buy in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: An Epic Role Playing Experience!!
customer_reviews.text: This series is brilliant, I have completed the first and currently playing ME2. Not only is the story excellent but the choices and decisions you make truly impact the game...or better yet the universe! The characters, customization, voice acting, graphics, etc..are all top notch. I think Bioware outdid themselves with Mass Effect, had I known it was this good I would of played it years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Dark Magician

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I will say it once and I will say it again, mass effect on PC is pretty. If you have never had a chance to play all mass effect games do it now if you have a decent PC to run them. Plus for $13 I couldn't resist. Great story, great characters, and one of the best series ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Lone5942

customer_reviews.title: This hands down the best game on the citadel!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best Si-fi game series. This is actually my second time buying the complete trilogy (originally on Xbox360). Bioware has done an amazing job of putting you in to shoes of the main character and making you care about the choices you make. Nearly every choice you are confronted with will have some impact on the fate of the galaxy or the relationships of those who follow you. There are very few game franchises that truly immerse the gamer and makes him / her feel vested in all the events that happen in that world. Mass Effect is one of games. I highly recommend for all.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T

customer_reviews.title: Greatest series of all time, with an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game on sale and it was an incredible price for what is, in my opinion, the greatest video game trilogy of all time. I activated it on Origin and everything worked very smoothly. I see there are some complaints on here about that, but I liked Origin - the cloud saves came in handy when one of my computers broke midway through the game. Never had any issues there. As for the game itself, the story and universe of Mass Effect is unmatched. If you haven't played these games yet, I'd highly recommend purchasing this series.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE. I got this in the mail ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE. I got this in the mail, and apparently you have to register with EA, problem is the site has been out of working order for weeks. do not waist your money. To the seller: I want every penny i spent getting this returned to me immediately for sales on fault pretenses. attached pic has been going on for over 14 hours of trying to register. EA has not been helpful or even care, neither has the seller, origin, or even amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Baker

customer_reviews.title: Got it on Sale for 15$ - Great for people who never bought any of the Mass Effect's before
customer_reviews.text: I believe i bought this on sale for 15$ - and that's a price that can't be beat. For one game - I might have passed this deal, but for all 3? I knew i had to get it. I have only played Mass Effect 1 for the time being, but I do enjoy RPG games like Skyrim, and Dragon's Age, but I wanted to try an RPG in space. Highly recommend the trilogy if you want to play all the Mass Effects - and you never had the will to buy them until now.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Luc Hayes

customer_reviews.title: One of the best game trilogies out there
customer_reviews.text: Great story-line, great game experience, and a great job of keeping up with changing game design on the part of the design team.
customer_reviews.author: rfpizzle

customer_reviews.title: ... this on sale on Amazon and it was a great purchase. The only thing was that I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on sale on Amazon and it was a great purchase. The only thing was that I had to download the Origin program to then download it from there and had to register my EA account, so the process was a little longer, but it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C.

customer_reviews.title: It is now an older set of games
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought an Acer Aspire 7 (see other review) and bought this game as a reward from work. The first Mass Effect is a good game, but it lags on my i7 processor. I have not started the other 2 because I will be playing them in order.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome. The internet will hate me for this
customer_reviews.text: Played them all back to back, couldn't stop. Totally awesome. The internet will hate me for this, but I think the third one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: I_LOVE_TECH

customer_reviews.title: May not run on Windows 8 properly.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the game but save yourself the trouble and just download it instead. I bought the physical copy because I have an extremely slow internet connection and thought it would be easier this way but since I am running windows 8 the installation from the dvd version did not work on my computer. I ended up having to uninstall the game then spend hours downloading the first Mass Effect game with my slow connection to finally get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Flawed collection, missing a lot of story DLC
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately missing all the nice DLC in ME2 and ME3, DLC that will set you back about $60 - and that is with just the essential story ones, not including the item packs. This is way more than the trilogy itself. While you can play the games and pretend the DLC does not exist, ones like Lair of the Shadowbroker, Arrival, From Ashes, Leviathan or Citadel really do add a lot of insight to the story and should be included in what is supposed to be a complete collection.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: One of the Great, Great games.
customer_reviews.text: Greatest sci-fi rpg of all time for almost nothing? Pretty much a no-brainer. True you still have to buy almost all the DLC content but once you get into the name those too will seem like no brainers as well. The truth is once you start to feel connected to your Shepard you'll want to experience everything you can....
customer_reviews.author: Laozi

customer_reviews.title: The best gaming experience I've had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: It took me a really long time to get around to this trilogy but I am truly glad I finally got the chance to play it. This trilogy is absolutely incredible in so many ways. I would very seriously recommend this game to anyone who even remotely enjoys playing video games. The story, the characters, the combat, the game mechanics, the immersive world, the loads of informational text in the codex, the voice acting and dialog, All these aspects and more are fantastic and no expense was spared when creating these games. VERY worth the $30 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i really wanted to love it like i loved ME2
customer_reviews.text: i want to love this so much its a great game and has a much better combat system but it seems like it lost alot of the me1 and me2 grace it had. it just seems like there is less of the game and seems that there is more DLCs than there ever was before. i really think that EA ruined it and it could have been soooo much more than it is now. i dont think rockstar would do this kinda thing but i always wonder what would happen if rockstar or ubisoft would have done this
customer_reviews.author: dima

customer_reviews.title: A Must Play
customer_reviews.text: I played through the last 2 games in this series on an Xbox360 and a PS3. I picked up this trilogy because of a sale that made it cheaper than buying just the first game in the series but even at normal prices this is a great game series that, IMHO, plays better on the PC than the console. The keyboard/mouse combo is more precise than a controller for this type of game. This does not come with all of the DLC though... I docked a star for that because, to me, a collection like this should be complete.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Tons or hours of enjoyment for low price!
customer_reviews.text: I am commander Sheppard and this is my favorite game in the citadel!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great trilogy
customer_reviews.text: I've played these games several times over. Such a great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Love Mass Effect - Hate Origin
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the Mass Effects, but hate the new requirement to run Origin to play these games. There should be no need for me to have an internet connection to play these single-player games. My old Origin password had expired - or I got it wrong. Attempting to reset the password required the usual where EA sends out an email to reset password. Naturally, clicking that link sends me to a website where I get a 404 - File or directory not found. Horrible. And what other option do you have? None. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Incredible series, through and through
customer_reviews.text: If you've never played the Mass Effect series, you haven't truely experienced a masterpiece in gaming history. Sure, there are flaws, but nothing overwhelming or unbearable to the point where these games aren't enjoyable. If you're looking for the best combination of story, graphics and gameplay then look no further. This being on PC, i would highly suggest looking up HD graphics mods, which only further enhance the greatness of this title as a whole. You could play this entire series over and over and it could be completely different every time. Its just that good. Stop wasting your time. Buy this now.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work at all with Win 10.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work at all with Win 10. After spending hours and hours of troubleshooting it never worked. I tried everything I read on the internet to solved the failure. the programs could load, but would never start up. the messages stated it could not connect to the game server.
customer_reviews.author: Randal A. Koers

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for $12 and absolutely love the trilogy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for $12 and absolutely love the trilogy. As stated by every other reviewer though, dlcs are mostly absent from 2 and 3. That wouldn't normally be a problem, but they never go on sale. If you are a completionist on a budget, it might be better to wait until they re-release the trilogy with everything included. Don't know when or even if, but it would save you from obsessively checking Origin for a sale ;)
customer_reviews.author: SpaceCore42

customer_reviews.title: My favorite game
customer_reviews.text: my favorite game series of all time, i cannot remember how many times i have played through it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Hewett

customer_reviews.title: I suddenly had the urge to play this fantastic game again
customer_reviews.text: I suddenly had the urge to play this fantastic game again. One of the best series of all time. Never played it on pc and getting the 3 games in one package is awesome. The reason I gave this 5 stars is because trying to purchase from origin is hell. EA customer support is horrible. Right now it's 20 bucks on sale, but sadly with so many issues, I have not been able to purchase. Decided to come here and spend the extra 9 bucks. Lo and behold, I'm finally downloading it. Thank you amazon for your excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Armando Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: I love the Mass Effect series
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love the Mass Effect series. Bioware always does an amazing job with their games. But EA had to ruin it with Origin. The Origin client would not activate the product correctly. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Read This if you plan on buying it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game because everyone told me it was good and I liked dragons age. Even though I am not huge on first person shooter I still found the game fun and I LOVED the story line, even the ending people complained about on the 3rd which boggles my mind. Anyway if you do buy this, be aware this a problem with ME3 disk, it thinks you don't have rights to install it, the only way to fix this is to register the game and download it, and I think its about 30 gigs so plan on doing this over night. This is my only complaint, not a deal break but definitely something they should fix
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Internet required.
customer_reviews.text: Even though you don't play on line like you would for a MMORPG you are still required to have an Internet connection. The whole reason for buying discs is so I can play when I am off line... Other than that the game is amazing, the art is amazing, and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bolon

customer_reviews.title: Mass Effect Great deep game
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of the 3rd having a locked character because you did not preorder the deluxe version. The rest of the games are just a steal. For 10.00 dollars a piece you be a fool not to buy this awesome trilogy. (3rd one be better if you got the other character needed free since he is essential to the story.) Most games now in days are all going 1st person shooters and most 3rd person games finish very quickly, but with mass effect you get to enjoy this deep world and enjoy each characters you take with you storyline.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good Game, Installation is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: I could not install the game from the 6 cd pack I received. I had to install Origin first. Once Origin is installed, I had to download each ME game separately from there. I also have to log in to Origin to play the game. When I had issues with the install, I had to go online to submit a help ticket. I was not impressed with the EA customer service. The game itself is entertaining. The process to install and play is not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: pcdoc

customer_reviews.title: EA strikes again
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that I needed an online service like the terrible Origins client to verify that I BOUGHT THE GAME LEGALLY WITH A GAME FROM 2007 WHEN ORIGINS WASN'T EVEN AROUND. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Review 'Mass Effect'
customer_reviews.text: The first game is as expected. There are a number of problems you have to overcome in the game, but that keeps it interesting. I look forward to going through it all the way to Mas Effect Andromeda.
customer_reviews.author: mainframetech

customer_reviews.title: Great game...terrible game client
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying the game, but buying it from here forces me to buy it through the EA "Origins" client, which is trying to be like Steam. I've had trouble getting all three games to start, and each time it's required multiple calls to the EA help hotline, which isn't always useful. It saved me $10 to get it through here rather than Steam, but I absolutely regret going through EA for this game. Don't make my mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Neemerz

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with complete DLCs for PC version,
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with complete DLCs for PC version, which is complete BS because this game is almost a decade old now and any trilogy pack should include all the DLCs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Game Ever
customer_reviews.text: We had originally bought the Mass Effect series on Steam, they were so amazing that we had to get the hard copy of them! This is the best series I have played. I got so caught up in them i would look at the clock and realize I had just lost 2 hours in what felt like minutes. It's an Epic story line with in depth characters and an epic world to play in. So worth buying and adding to your collection!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Storm

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get Mass Effect to work for the life ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get Mass Effect to work for the life of me, so after 2 days of trying to get it to work I just went a head and played Mass Effect 2. Well the next day after playing Mass Effect 2 a message popped up saying that Mass Effect had to change my settings, so I clicked on it and it started working. I was trying everything to get it to work and it randomly fixed it's self!
customer_reviews.author: weaver

customer_reviews.title: It's Mass Effect
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say. Its a collection of a great series of Space RPG games where there is a great and epic over arching story that you can carve out for yourself and also make into a really strong story and journey that you will go through. You can fit the character into your play style and make decisions that leave you with thoughts to think about after the game is turned off of why and what you did. Really strong RPG Shooter with great story telling and action for all to enjoy even if your just a shooter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wan

customer_reviews.title: Have been sent the European version twice
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Amazon has this advertised as the US version of the game... but what they send you is the European version. I've tried to get the correct game from them TWICE now and I'm still getting the wrong version.
customer_reviews.author: Acebris

customer_reviews.title: Code works well and is easy to activate
customer_reviews.text: Code works well and is easy to activate. Games are legendary, well.. part one and two, part three: meh. I would recommend this to fans of other Bioware games, it's just a different take on the old formula with a great story, choices which really make you think.
customer_reviews.author: Greg van der Meulen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Activated it right away on Origin. Origin will over write your mods so make sure once it updates the installs, uncheck the,"keep this game updated," option. Or it will verify and redownload like Steam does. Great price from Amazon. I wish Amazon would do more AAA titles with their games department.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't Install
customer_reviews.text: After a month it won't install. Each time I try to install it different things pop up on my screen. EA.com is no help. Origin not available. Origin update required. Code already in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 and 2 love it 3 I USE THIS CD FOR A COSTER ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 and 2 love it 3 I USE THIS CD FOR A COSTER UNDER MY COFFIE CUP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing dlc, but great games.
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the lack of a lot of the DLC is a little grating, but the games themselves are just as fantastic as when they were released. Well worth the purchase, especially if you catch it when it's on sale. 12 bucks for 3 of my favorite games of the last generation is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Moscow

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for our anniversary--Mass Effect is his favorite. He loved it. When I bought it I didn't realize it was the download and not the discs, but he really loves the download--he can log in anywhere and play his games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing trilogy
customer_reviews.text: I already have this trilogy on the 360. I upgraded to a gaming PC and buying the trilogy for PC seemed right. At $12, it was a steal. I can't wait to play through it again. Also, people are complaining about Origin... Good luck finding a legal download of the game that doesn't go through Origin. These games aren't on Steam either. I think people like to complain for the sake of complaining. And if people read the item description, it does not say COMPLETE trilogy. It also clearly lists the included DLC in the description. Not like Origin or Amazon was trying to trick you when it was listed clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing franchise!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these games. The story arc is great. I loved personalizing my own Shepard. The Fem-Shep voice actress is phenomenal. I've replayed the second and third games more times then I can count. I have seen so many different endings and banged almost all the coitus interest. I love these games.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Spisso

customer_reviews.title: Great item for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Mass Effect is a great series. It's nice to have all three games together, but it would be better to have a complete version including all DLC in one convenient package.
customer_reviews.author: Robb G.

customer_reviews.title: These have become my new favorite game. The story continues across all three games ...
customer_reviews.text: These have become my new favorite game. The story continues across all three games which allows deep character development. Great writing and graphics (even though the first one is dated at this point). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Monroe

customer_reviews.title: It's Mass Effect
customer_reviews.text: Three of the best games from the last generation of gaming. Fantastic action RPGs with an excellent story and well written characters, in an intriguing sci-fi setting that mirrors our own society, allowing the game to explore real life issues. Not without flaws. The combat feels very rough in the first game, though it's not bad. Improves with every iteration. Writing fluctuates in quality; most of it is very good, but a few characters are weak, especially when compared to a lot of their counterparts. Plot armor is annoying in a few instances. Still probably the best deal for these games you can find. If any of the above points sound interesting, buy this. It's just so good.
customer_reviews.author: William Figueroa Erickson

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you anything about how good the game itself actually is
customer_reviews.text: After downloading Origin, all three games refuse to download. Have send multiple emails to EA asking for assistance to no avail. I can't tell you anything about how good the game itself actually is, but the online game code for this is apparently worthless.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: EA SU*KS
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is amazing! The thing is that FREAKIN EA doesn't let me play the games I bought! Why?! Because: - it wants you to play it through Origin, so you download it and when it gets to 55% it just shuts down, after terrible customer service you finally get the installation to work, install the codes to play, and... - Boom! "Unable to connect to Mass Effect servers to activate Mass Effect", so you can only play mass effect 2 if you are lucky enough to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Basili

customer_reviews.title: The Game is great! I am only rating poorly because buying this ...
customer_reviews.text: The Game is great! I am only rating poorly because buying this game made it so I need to use it on origin. =[ Origin is a terrible program. Origin let some random people buy games with my credit card in other countries.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Works great after activating your product
customer_reviews.text: I had issues activating the game, I live in the states and received a EU copy (aside from being marketed as a US copy). I had to get on live chat with EA and have them put the code into my Origin account.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: I've not had a super huge amount of time to play through them all ...
customer_reviews.text: The games are legendary and I picked up all three at once. I've not had a super huge amount of time to play through them all and am still working through the first game. So far, it's a pretty awesome game!
customer_reviews.author: Curt L. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Broken game files, boo.
customer_reviews.text: Well, aside from the direct link not even working on the Amazon Page (I found that you have to download Origin by EA and download them through that program), I have not been pleased by the purchase. The game downloads from Origin seem to be broken...I cannot get the first game to boot at all and even after numerous attempts at fixing the files it has been over 3 months and I cannot even get it to work. I have seen that MOST people that attempt to get it to work are unable to and it is really frustrating. Would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fenryk E.

customer_reviews.title: I got this at a pretty good price
customer_reviews.text: It's Mass Effect. If you don't know what this is, likely no review will help you. If you know what ME is, then you're already sold on buying it or own it already. I got this at a pretty good price. Wish it contained all of the DLC, but I can't really complain. It's still three classic Bioware RPGs.
customer_reviews.author: Lathi255

customer_reviews.title: failure to install
customer_reviews.text: fails to install so far spent two hours also had tovresearch online to learn you dobt actualky install from these discs you download wirh the code in the pkg not impressed i was looking forward to this game
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Paz

customer_reviews.title: Problems with saving
customer_reviews.text: The game does not save when you are playing M. E. It tries to, but shows an error every time. However, I'm not sure about M. E2 or 3. I haven't tried those yet.
customer_reviews.author: starter73

customer_reviews.title: There are so many choices to make, throughout all ...
customer_reviews.text: There are so many choices to make, throughout all three games, and it is a monumental achievement that every single alternate story line winds its way back to the same ending, the only difference being a choice of colors! Stunning.
customer_reviews.author: KMattB

customer_reviews.title: just know it's awesome. And this trilogy is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how many times I beat Mass Effect 2 but...just know it's awesome. And this trilogy is worth it. I recommend skipping the 3rd game completely though...unless you like Multiplayer...the story wasn't all that in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: V. Longwood

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the fact that you have to install origin.
customer_reviews.author: Mirza A.

customer_reviews.title: great exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, install the direct x version included. Do not attempt to get the ridiculous steam controller to work it won't Origin is not bad. The games work perfectly We'll bang OK!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayman

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the origin tha comes from n the disk ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't use the origin tha comes from n the disk...in fact don't use the disks at all. Just rip the product key go online to download latest origin version. And install your games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three great games for $12 on sale great deal
customer_reviews.text: Had to pick this up when it went on sale for $12. The transaction was fast and easy. The games downloaded through Origin easily and quickly. Installed no issues expect for ME2 which required PhysiX from Nvidia and my card is AMD. Had to do some troubleshooting to get it to work properly. Other than that cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Worth checking out.
customer_reviews.text: Fan of the series, not a fan of origin or lack of controller support on pc.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I really don't understand the hype for this game. #stale
customer_reviews.author: Spider Man

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money... As ALL the other reviews say it, origin(EAs download manager) ruined this game(for PC at least) you go through the initial process of entering the game key 🔑 and then downloading all 56gb and some change for game ONE, but right at the 25% mark "origin had encounter a critical error and must stop" WHAT!?!!?! of you spend another 2 hours trying to redo and redo and then fix the problem, but still it doesn't work. WASTE OF MONEY. I also contacted amazon, the rep told me it was most likely the game key... Hub?!? Dude I told you i entered and DOWNLOADED the game, but whatever lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled that I found this deal. The entire trilogy, all in one place, all with instant access--and MUCH less than it would cost to buy them individually elsewhere. There were absolutely no problems redeeming these games with my origin library.
customer_reviews.author: Glask Aki

customer_reviews.title: $10 for all three. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only played 1 and it has for the most part held up. I think it was a rocky port to PC. I hear the next two should run better. Fun game but your stuck with the Origin client to run everything and that means more EA stuff on your computer. But for $10 it was hard to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Come With All DLC! Disgraceful Money Grab!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with all DLC! Actuall;y requires you to go and spend MORE money to bug all the remaining DLC, some of it the best for the game. Ridiculous rip-off for somethign claiming to be all three games in one package. Disgraceful money grab by EA.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Monte

customer_reviews.title: Great game series
customer_reviews.text: I had never played the series before but it went on sale and about 4 buddies texted me and said buy this so i did and it was well worth i recommend everyone to play this series.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: epic space opera rpg series
customer_reviews.text: i love this series of games, the only downside is you cant get some of the dlc, and the ones you can get cost more than what i paid for the complete trilogi.
customer_reviews.author: RamiroG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good games, 4 stars bc you get a random (and slightly lacking) grab bag of dlcs
customer_reviews.author: Golden Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The mass Effect Trilogy is a very good. It has a well made story line that encourages the players to invest into the main characters. With the added benefit that the choices you make in the games carry's over to the later games. Makes this a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: marcellus

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Sci-Fi role playing games ever can play this game over and over graphics great controls respond well and there is a fun factor as well the story line is great I mean what can I say just buy it and play it you just might love it to
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Discs were not readable - corrupt files?
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in proper packaging, but the discs were corrupt. I could not install them from the disc and had to opt for a Steam download instead. Luckily the product keys were applied and the game worked but what the hell.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Steal of a deal.
customer_reviews.text: Just so much yes packed into three games. I have all three mass effect games on Xbox already. So when I saw this package deal WITH DLC for $10. It is impossible to pass that up. I am moving more to the PC side so this was one hell of a deal to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic gaming experience, sans EA.
customer_reviews.text: by itself, there are a few bugs and story issues that I did not like whatsoever, though that is from the developer, so I just modded the crap out of it and went on with my day. The Mass Effect series has definitely got to be one of the most immersive, cinematic gaming experiences that I have ever embarked upon, and playing it is like watching the most fantastically epic sci-fi movie that was ever not produced.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron DeVaul

customer_reviews.title: The best games ever
customer_reviews.text: The best games ever, but not only, it is the best science fiction story too! It is my favorite game!
customer_reviews.author: Cristiano Petrini

product_meta.title: Mass Effect Trilogy [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC DownloadFROM THE MANUFACTURER



As Commander Shepard, rise to become the galaxy’s most elite soldier and lead an all-out war to stop an ancient and ruthless enemy: the Reapers. With over 75 hours of content and more than 300 awards, one of gaming’s most acclaimed franchises is available for the first time in a premium foiled box set.

Heart-pounding action meets gripping interactive storytelling where you decide how your unique story unfolds. Assemble and lead your team aboard the SSV Normandy, the most advanced ship in the galaxy, and travel to distant and unexplored star systems. On your journey, meet a cast of intriguing characters each with their own story to tell. Wield powerful weapons and customize them with upgrades to create new and devastating attacks. All the thrilling action and your decisions culminate into a heroic battle against the greatest threat ever known.

The fate of the galaxy lies in your hands-how will you chose to fight for it?

Key Features

 * Includes Mass Effect 1, 2, and 3. Over 75 hours of story content, plus Mass Effect 3’s critically acclaimed multiplayer mode.
 * Create and customize your own character with his or her appearance and skills, then play your Commander Shepard through all three Mass Effect games.
 * Experience an amazingly rich and detailed universe where your decisions have profound consequences on the action and the outcome.
 * Build a personalized arsenal with powerful weapons complete with their own upgrades and modifications.
 * Unleash devastating abilities and skills as you command and train an elite squad. 
 * Take the war online with class-based, co-operative multiplayer in Mass Effect 3. 


On PC, Mass Effect will include Bring Down the Sky and Pinnacle Station. For Mass Effect 2, Cerberus Network will be included which features Zaeed – The Price of Revenge, The Firewalker Pack, Cerberus Assault Gear, Arc Projector heavy weapon, and Normandy Crash site mission. For Mass Effect 3, Online Pass will be included granting players access to co-op multiplayer.


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
EA Origin account required for game activation and installation.

Minimum Specifications:Recommended Specifications: OS:Win 7, Vista and XP Processor:1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (equivalent AMD CPU)2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (equivalent AMD CPU) RAM:1GB for XP / 2GB RAM for Vista/Win 72GB for XP / 4GB RAM for Vista/Win 7 Hard Drive:15 GB Video Card:256 MB (with Pixel Shader 3.0 support)AMD/ATI Radeon HD 4850 512 MB or greater, NVidia GeForce 9800 GT 512 MB or greater Additional Info:DirectX 9.0c August 2009 (included) INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION. INTERNET CONNECTION, ORIGIN ACCOUNT, ACCEPTANCE OF PRODUCT AND ORIGIN END USER LICENSE AGREEMENTS, INSTALLATION OF THE ORIGIN CLIENT SOFTWARE (WWW.ORIGIN.COM/ABOUT) AND REGISTRATION WITH ENCLOSED SINGLE-USE SERIAL CODE REQUIRED TO PLAY, ACCESS BONUS CONTENT (IF ANY) AND ACCESS ONLINE SERVICES (IF ANY). SERIAL CODE REGISTRATION IS LIMITED TO ONE ORIGIN ACCOUNT PER SERIAL CODE. SERIAL CODE IS NON-TRANSFERABLE ONCE USED. EULAS AND ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.EA.COM/1/PRODUCT-EULAS. EA ONLINE PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.EA.COM. YOU MUST BE 13+ TO ACTIVATE SOFTWARE, ACCESS ONLINE FEATURES AND REGISTER FOR AN ORIGIN ACCOUNT. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES, ONLINE SERVICES AND DOWNLOADABLE CONTENT AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON WWW.EA.COM/1/SERVICE-UPDATES.
feature_bullets: Over 75 hours of story content, plus Mass Effect 3’s critically acclaimed multiplayer mode.
Experience an amazingly rich and detailed universe where your decisions have profound consequences on the action and the outcome.
Create and customize your own character with his or her appearance and skills, then play your Commander Shepard through all three Mass Effect games.
